container.heading: Procedures for the Safe Handling and Processing of Juice

para.text: Provides the HACCP requirements for juice processors as defined by this chapter.
Does not apply to a retail establishment or a food processing plant that:
Makes and sells juice directly to consumers; and
Does not sell or distribute juice to another business.

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: All provisions of 21 CFR 120 are incorporated by reference.

section.heading: Requirements for the Safe Handling and Processing of Juice.
section.text: A juice processor, as defined in this chapter, shall comply with all of the requirements of 21 CFR 120.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§21-234 and 21-304, Annotated Code of Maryland
